abstract: The former chief executive of eBay, Meg Whitman, took the witness stand on Monday to make the case that Craigslist, the free online classifieds provider, had unfairly denied the e-commerce company a seat on its board.
snippet: The former chief executive of eBay, Meg Whitman, took the witness stand on Monday to make the case that Craigslist, the free online classifieds provider, had unfairly denied the e-commerce company a seat on its board.
lead_paragraph: The former chief executive of eBay, Meg Whitman, took the witness stand on Monday to make the case that Craigslist, the free online classifieds provider, had unfairly denied the e-commerce company a seat on its board.

headline.main: Ex-Chief of eBay Describes Effort to Buy Craigslist
